pages.text: Silver Swords are the preferred weapon of a Witcher when hunting $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_monsters)creatures and monsters$(). Although the blade is more delicate than steel, monsters are weakened by the properties of silver, allowing you to harvest $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophies$() from them if holding the appropriate $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contract.$()
Turn the page to learn more...

The standard Witcher's silver sword. Will allow you to harvest a $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophy$() from any $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_monsters)monster-type enemies$(), provided you have their $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contract$() in your inventory. You will also deal additional damage to monster-type enemies if you are holding $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_blade_oil)[Blade Oil]$() in your offhand.

pages.title: Recipe (shaped)
pages.text: Ingredients: $(l:crafting/dimeritium_ingot#page_dimeritium)Dimeritium Ingot$() x2, Leather x2, and Stick x1.

An upgrade to the silver sword, dealing more base attack damage. Will allow you to harvest a $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophy$() from any $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_monsters)monster-type enemies$(), provided you have their $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contract$() in your inventory. You will also deal additional damage to monster-type enemies if you are holding $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_blade_oil)[Blade Oil]$() in your offhand.

pages.title: Recipe (shaped)
pages.text: Ingredients: $(l:weapons_armour/silver_sword_entry#page_silver_sword)Silver Sword$() x1, $(l:crafting/enriched_dimeritium_ingot#page_enriched_dimeritium)Enriched Dimeritium Ingot$() x6, and Leather x2.

The final upgrade to the silver sword, dealing more base attack damage than its two predecessors. Can be upgraded into a silver $(l:weapons_armour/relic_weapons_entry#page_relic_weapons)relic weapon$() at a smithing table. Will allow you to harvest a $(l:contracts/trophies#page_trophies)trophy$() from any $(l:contracts/enemy_types#page_monsters)monster-type enemies$(), provided you have their $(l:contracts/contracts#page_contracts)contract$() in your inventory. You will also deal additional damage to monster-type enemies if you are holding $(l:signs_abilities/blade_oil#page_blade_oil)[Blade Oil]$() in your offhand.

pages.title: Recipe (smithing)
pages.text: Combine an $(l:weapons_armour/silver_sword_entry#page_enhanced_silver_sword)Enhanced Silver Sword$() with a Netherite Ingot in a smithing table.
